name: Animal Messenger
description: By whispering to a Tiny beast, you send it to deliver a message. The creature travels to a location you describe and delivers the message to the creature you designate. If mounted flying speed is used, the messenger can travel up to 50 miles in 24 hours; otherwise 25 miles.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 48 hours for each slot level above 2nd.

effects.description: Instruct a Tiny beast to carry and deliver your spoken message to a designated creature at a described location; travels ~25 miles in 24 hours (50 miles if it can fly for that duration). Duration extends with higher slots.
